member.summary: Processes raw data that was received from the socket and places it into the appropriate buffer.
member.param: The raw byte buffer containing the data received from the socket.
The size of the data received from the socket (reported from the EndReceive).

member.summary: Encloses a byte array with another byte.

The byte array that needs a byte enclosed around it.

member.summary: Combines two byte arrays.

member.name: P:Server.WinsockErrorEventArgs.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the error code returned by the socket.
member.remarks: If it wasn't returned by the socket, it defaults to success.

member.name: P:Server.WinsockErrorEventArgs.Details
member.summary: Gets a value containing more details than the typical error message.

member.name: T:Server.WinsockStates
member.summary: Enumeration containing the various Winsock states.

member.name: F:Server.WinsockStates.Closed
member.summary: The Winsock is closed.

member.name: F:Server.WinsockStates.Listening
member.summary: The Winsock is listening (TCP for connections, UDP for data).

member.name: F:Server.WinsockStates.ResolvingHost
member.summary: The Winsock is attempting the resolve the remote host.

member.name: F:Server.WinsockStates.HostResolved
member.summary: The remote host has been resolved to IP address.

member.name: F:Server.WinsockStates.Connecting
member.summary: The Winsock is attempting to connect to the remote host.

member.name: F:Server.WinsockStates.Connected
member.summary: The Winsock is connected to a remote source (client or server).

member.name: F:Server.WinsockStates.Closing
member.summary: The Winsock is attempting to close the connection.

member.name: T:Server.WinsockProtocols
member.summary: Enumeration containing the various supported network protocols.

member.name: F:Server.WinsockProtocols.Tcp
member.summary: The Winsock should use the connection-based TCP protocol.

member.name: F:Server.WinsockProtocols.Udp
member.summary: The Winsock should use the connectionless-based UDP protocol.

member.name: T:Server.WinsockIPTypes
member.summary: Enumeration containing the various supported IP protocols.

member.name: F:Server.WinsockIPTypes.IPv4
member.summary: The Winsock should use the IPv4 addressing scheme

member.name: F:Server.WinsockIPTypes.IPv6
member.summary: The Winsock should use the IPv6 addressing scheme

member.name: T:Server.Winsock
member.summary: Encapsulates the socket functionality into an easy to use VB6 like component.
member.author: Chris Kolkman
member.history: 02-07-2007 Added support for IPv6 vs IPv4. 07-12-2006 Fixed closing to support UDP listener closing. 06-27-2006 Added support for UDP. 06-12-2006 Added support for the SendProgress event. 06-09-2006 Added catches for closing errors. Added functionality to make the component thread-safe (calls to a textbox in the ErrorReceived handler won't error anymore). Added ability to send/get System.Drawing.Bitmap images. Modified some property names to be more consistent with other controls (removed underscores). Added action list (designer smart tags) support. 06-08-2006 Basic functionality completed (sending/receiving string/files). Disconnects handled (server doesn't yet detect pulled plug at client. Can send and receive up to 2GB of data (in one send command).

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instances of the class.
member.remarks: Only thread safe if placed on a form (synchronizing object gets set automatically).

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class (thread-safe).
member.param: The synchronizing object used to make this thread safe.

member.name: E:Server.Winsock.DataArrival
member.summary: Occurs when data arrives on the socket.
member.remarks: Raised only after all parts of the data have been collected.

member.name: E:Server.Winsock.SendComplete
member.summary: Occurs when sending of data is completed.

member.name: E:Server.Winsock.Disconnected
member.summary: Occurs when disconnected from the remote computer (client and server).

member.name: E:Server.Winsock.Connected
member.summary: Occurs when connection is achieved (client and server).

member.name: E:Server.Winsock.ConnectionRequest
member.summary: Occurs on the server when a client is attempting to connect.
member.remarks: Client registers connected at this point. Server must Accept in order for it to be connected.

member.name: E:Server.Winsock.ErrorReceived
member.summary: Occurs when an error is detected in the socket.
member.remarks: May also be raised on disconnected (depending on disconnect circumstance).

member.name: E:Server.Winsock.StateChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the state of the socket changes.

member.name: E:Server.Winsock.SendProgress
member.summary: Occurs when the send buffer has been sent but not all the data has been sent yet.

member.name: P:Server.Winsock.LocalPort
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the port the control should listen on.

member.name: P:Server.Winsock.MaxPendingConnections
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that control the length of the maximum length of the pending connections queue.

member.name: P:Server.Winsock.RemoteServer
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines what server to connect to.
member.remarks: Can only change if closed or listening.

member.name: P:Server.Winsock.RemotePort
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines which port on the server to connect to.
member.remarks: Can only change if closed or listening.

member.name: P:Server.Winsock.LegacySupport
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if Legacy support should be used or not.
member.remarks: Legacy support is to support VB6 winsock style connections.

member.name: P:Server.Winsock.HasData
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the buffer has data for retrieval.

member.name: P:Server.Winsock.BufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the interal size of the byte buffers.

member.name: P:Server.Winsock.SynchronizingObject
member.summary: Gets or sets the synchronizing object making this control thread-safe.

member.name: P:Server.Winsock.Protocol
member.summary: Gets or sets the winsock protocol to use when communicating with the remote computer.

member.name: P:Server.Winsock.IPType
member.summary: Gets or sets the IP type to use when connecting to the remote computer.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Listen
member.summary: Places a in a listening state.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Listen(System.Int32)
member.summary: Places a in a listening state.
member.param: The port to begin listening on.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Close
member.summary: Closes an open connection.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Accept(System.Net.Sockets.Socket)
member.summary: Accepts a client connect as valid and begins to monitor it for incoming data.
member.param: A that represent the client being accepted.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Connect
member.summary: Establishes a connection to a remote host.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Establishes a connection to a remote host.
member.param: A containing the Hostname or IP address of the remote host.
A value indicated the port on the remote host to connect to.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.LocalIP
member.summary: Gets the local machine's IP address.
member.remarks: In the case a machine has more than one IP address it retrieves the first one.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.State
member.summary: Gets the state of the control.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Send(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends a raw byte array to a connected socket on a remote computer.
member.param: The byte array to send.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Send(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a string to a connected socket on a remote computer.
member.param: The string to send.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Send(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Sends a System.Drawing.Bitmap to a connected socket on a remote computer.
member.param: The image to be transmitted.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.SendFile(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a file to a connected socket on a remote computer.
member.param: The full path of the file you wish to send.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Get(System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the next value in the buffer as a string.
member.param: A String that stores the returned data.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.Get(System.Drawing.Bitmap@)
member.summary: Gets the next value in the buffer as a System.Drawing.Bitmap
member.param: A System.Drawing.Bitmap that stores the returned image.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.GetFile(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the next value in the buffer as a file.
member.param: The full path of the file you wish to save to.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.OnStateChanged(Server.WinsockStates)
member.summary: Changes the state and raises the StateChanged event (thread safe).
member.param: The state that the control is changing to.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.OnError(System.String,System.String,System.Net.Sockets.SocketError,System.String)
member.summary: Raises the ErrorReceived event (thread safe).
member.param: A String containing the error message.
A String containing the function in which the error originated.
The ErrorCode object returned by the socket.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.OnConnectionRequest(System.Net.Sockets.Socket)
member.summary: Raises the ConnectionRequest event, and closes cancelled connections (thread safe).
member.param: The new client socket that needs to be accepted.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.OnConnected
member.summary: Raises the Connected event (thread safe).

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.OnDisconnected
member.summary: Raises the Disconnected event (thread safe).

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.OnSendComplete(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Raises the SendComplete event (thread safe).
member.param: The total bytes sent.
The number of bytes that should have been sent.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.OnSendProgress(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Raises the SendProgress event (thread safe).
member.param: The total bytes sent so far.
The number of bytes that need to be sent.

member.name: M:Server.Winsock.OnDataArrival(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Raises the DataArrival event (thread safe).
member.param: The total number of bytes received.

member.name: T:Server.WinsockMonitor
member.summary: A "monitor" for the class. Holds all the functionality and calls back to the Winsock class to notify the user.
